author: santiago castro
comment: I bought  a watch feature n it doesn't work  properly I want my money back

reply.author: 12 Red Dots
reply.content: Hi, is your smartwatch Android Wear based? If yes, please contact us and specify in the letter model of your smartphone and smartwatch, version of Android on your devices and watchface that you bought. If not, just send us a message to contact@watchface.market and we will return your money back.

comment: Installed and selected the 1 free watch face.  My moto 360 2nd gen has a blank face.  That's it.  I rebooted watch and phone and still a blank face on watch.  Would be willing to purchase a watch face if free one actually worked.  Like the military faces

reply.author: 12 Red Dots
reply.content: Thanks for feedback. We have fixed the issue - please, update the app, everything is working correctly now. Hope you will change your opinion and give us better rate. Cheers!

author: Goku Hn
comment: I enjoy using this app. It helps me download the clock interface that I like. Every day I can use a new interface clock for my phone. Using it is simple. Just sign in with Facebook or Google account. It works very stable on my device

author: Petr Motyčka
comment: Tato aplikace vypadá pro mě jako velmi užitečná pro moje inteligentní hodinky. Dostupných je mnoho vzhledů a dle autorů se i na dalších pracuje. Hodinky jsou přesné i  v režimu úspory. Mohu doporučit.

comment: There are many beautiful watch faces in this app. It's very useful for me. Thanks a lot, devs!

author: Joydeep Datta Gupta
comment: Good.But need more watch  faces.

author: Lambton Elbert
comment: Allows you to combine your own graphic elements and lua scripts to make amazing watch faces. Some limited sample graphics are included, but many others exist scattered about the web. I can't imagine owning a smart watch without this app!
title: Powerful, easy to use tool for custom faces

author: Bryce Arlie
comment: The different options are endless.. Some faces can slow down my moto 360, but I think that's the watches fault more than the apps'.
title: Samsung s5 -  moto 360

author: Betty Peggi
comment: I really liked this face. I set it up and customized it. With this face on my 360 dies in about 6 hours. I normally get the day out of it. Edit: I rebooted the watch after installing the face. Battery life has improved.

Hi Ben, 

Thank you for your comment, and sorry for the issue. We've faced some issues with the server, but now we have fixed everything. Please double check it again. If you'll face any other issues feel free to contact us.
